page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: NORTHFIELD HAS 12 WMPT SERVICES BY DAY & 1 BY NIGHT. MIDLAND RED OPERATE NUMEROUS SERVICES & MANY COACH ROUTES INCLUDE BRISTOL RD SOUTH. THERE IS 1 TAXI CAB SERVICE WHICH IS ON CALL 24 HOURS. A VERY SPECIAL CAR HIRE FIRM USING ONLY DAIMLER LIMOUSINES & SILVER GREY MERCED ES IS ORGANISED FROM WOODLAND RD.ALL ROYAL VISITORS TO THE MIDLANDS ARE TRAN SPORTED BY THEM. CAR AND COMMERCIAL DELIVERIES LTD PICK UP NEW VEHICLES FROM THE FACTORY,THEY HAVE THE FRANCHISE TO DELIVER TO ALL PARTS OF WALES. LOCKWOOD U-DRIVE HAVE 16 CARS & 6 VANS FOR PEOPLE TO HIRE. MAIN LINERS AND DMU REGULARLY TRAVEL ACROSS THE CITY TO FOUR OAKS & LICH FIELD.
